channel.title: Need help got server running!
channel.description:
Its all working using X-Scap3 (Pimpscape) and i can join by typing the ip as 0.0.0.0 and i connect im now owner but no one can join what the ip they join with?
Plus enyone wanna be a coder 4 me? Or i type no ip in and im in so how do people connect?

item.title: Need help got server running!
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

read Mod Taharok Ultimate Server Guide.
He explains how to make no-ip, and how to open the ports you need.
(in his runserver.bat port 5439 i tought, not sure)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help got server running!
item.dc:creator: @palarace palarace
item.description:
@palarace wrote:

WEll tut i have no ip server name pk-nutz.servegame.com so what i do now?? i try connecting to tht and error i have black window open with my source i changed my self to owner and when i type 0.0.0.0 in serverip: it sines me on as owner? or it works if i type localhost

Read full topic

item.title: Need help got server running!
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

hamachi there is tut, but i suggest no-ip. just make a no-ip account and ur done (only if you did the whole router rule setup)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help got server running!
item.dc:creator: @KingTasty KingTasty
item.description:
@KingTasty wrote:

ok… if i’m right no one can get on 0.0.0.0 because that’s just some random name to log on.
other people can’t get on because that’s not really a server. So… you need to either get hamachi or no-ip and to learn how to install/use those. I think there might be a tut on it some where in tutorials.

Read full topic
